titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on audio interface units for sound mixing, recording, and editing capable of full interface control by separate automatic data processing system using proprietary software protocol.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/30/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on audio interface units for sound mixing, recording, and editing capable of full interface control by separate automatic data processing system using proprietary software protocol.
